comments: Lexical frame (Lexical Unit) with functional attributes (Lexical Elements) to lexical values (Lexical Entries): captures the semantic realisation of  the syntactic dependencies
strengths: FrameNet : large amount of lexical frames and annotated corpora

comments: Captures the semantic realisation of the syntactic or morphological dependencies
shortcomings: High variability of actual realisation. Idiosyncratic
